Articles.Content:
Today is a great day for the Jedi Space Program. Today the Curiosity 1, the probe lander set for Duna, landed, becoming the first Kerbalmade object to land on another planet.

It was easier than anticipated, although the landing itself took three quickloads. The probe landed on the night side, but the parachutes meant this was not a problem. It measured the temperature gravity and atmosphere on Duna.

Future plans include a manned interplanetary landing and a space station. Once the space station is complete, a grand tour may be in store...

PS.This happened on my birthday, no less! What a great present!

Congratulations on your success! I'm currently attempting a project on Duna and Ike, eventually I hope for bases to be located on the two bodies.

Happy Brirthday by the way!
Happy birthday! Enjoy the feeling of success!
